thread.title: Bernie Ecclestone: Formula One rulebook needs ripping up and starting over - Oxford Times
thread.title_full: Bernie Ecclestone: Formula One rulebook needs ripping up and starting over - Oxford Times - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Oxford Times
title: Bernie Ecclestone: Formula One rulebook needs ripping up and starting over - Oxford Times
text:
Bernie Ecclestone has called for Formula One's rulebook to be torn up in a dramatic overhaul of the sport's regulations. In a wide-ranging interview with German broadcaster ZDF, Ecclestone, flanked by former FIA president Max Mosley, believes Formula One has become an "engineer's championship" with little emphasis on the driver.
 Oxford Times.
